hotOnly.description: Enables Hot Module Replacement without page refresh as fallback.

lazy.description: Disables watch mode and recompiles bundle only on a request.

host.description: The host the server listens to.

filename.description: The filename that needs to be requested in order to trigger a recompile (only in lazy mode).

publicPath.description: URL path where the webpack files are served from.

port.description: The port the server listens to.

socket.description: The Unix socket to listen to (instead of on a host).

watchOptions.description: Options for changing the watch behavior.

headers.description: Response headers that are added to each response.

clientLogLevel.description: Controls the log messages shown in the browser.

key.description: The contents of a SSL key.

cert.description: The contents of a SSL certificate.

ca.description: The contents of a SSL CA certificate.

pfx.description: The contents of a SSL pfx file.

pfxPassphrase.description: The passphrase to a (SSL) PFX file.

inline.description: Enable inline mode to include client scripts in bundle (CLI-only).

public.description: The public hostname/ip address of the server.

contentBase.description: A directory to serve files non-webpack files from.

watchContentBase.description: Watches the contentBase directory for changes.

open.description: Let the CLI open your browser with the URL.

features.description: The order of which the features will be triggered.

staticOptions.description: Options for static files served with contentBase.

setup.description: Exposes the Express server to add custom middleware or routes.

stats.description: Decides what bundle information is displayed.

reporter.description: Customize what the console displays when compiling.

noInfo.description: Hide all info messages on console.

serverSideRender.description: Expose stats for server side rendering (experimental).

index.description: The filename that is considered the index file.
